title: Last update patch= Never ending failing launches

replies.body:
Hmmm.. A lot of issues with launching can often be resolved by running the launcher as admin. You can easily do this by right-clicking on the desktop icon and select *run as administrator*. 

Let me know if this worked. ^.^   If it didn't can you provide a more detailed description of what you experience?
I just fixed mine. If you have LoL recorder kill that application. Thats what fixed mine
